channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Turkish student at Tufts University detained, video shows masked people handcuffing her
item.description: A lawyer for a Turkish national and doctoral student at Tufts University says she has been detained by Department of Homeland Security agents without explanation.

item.title: States move to ban or restrict use of synthetic dyes used in candies and cereal
Pilot rescued with 2 girls from icy Alaska lake was not authorized to have passengers, official says
